title: Meet the Jansens
description: When Guy Jansen's stepson Josh brings a girlfriend home from college, Guy doesn't think much of it at first. But when he encounters young Chrissy late at night in the kitchen, things escalate in ways Guy never could have imagined. WARNING: This 6000+ word story includes steamy adult scenes, INTENDED FOR MATURE AUDIENCES ONLY 18+.
author: Lianah Morgan
